text: How to store a dictionary on a Django Model?
I need to store some data on a Django model.
These data are not equal to all instances of the model.

At first I thought on subclassing the model, but I'm trying to keep the application flexible; if I use subclasses, I'll need to create a whole class each time i need a new kind of object, and that's no good.
I'll also end up with a lot of subclasses only to store a pair of extra fields.
I really feel that a dictionary would be the best approach, but there's nothing on the Djando documentation (or I can't find it).
